name: Patryk Zaslawski
profile_summary: As a skilled Cloud Dev/Ops Engineer with 8+ years of experience in software engineering, I specialize in leveraging **AWS**, **Azure**, **Terraform**, and **Kubernetes** to design and implement robust cloud solutions. My expertise in **Docker**, CI/CD methodologies, and automation tools like **Azure DevOps**, **Git Actions**, and **Bamboo** enables streamlined deployment and continuous integration processes. Proficient in scripting with **PowerShell** and engaging in **ETL/ELT processes**, I possess solid analytical and troubleshooting skills that ensure efficient system performance and reliability. My background in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask, SQLAlchemy) and familiarity with database technologies such as **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **MongoDB** further complement my cloud capabilities, allowing me to build secure applications tailored to business needs. With a keen attention to detail and the ability to multitask, I consistently deliver innovative and effective solutions in dynamic environments.
